sourcesContent:
import { clothingList, hasBottom, hasHeadWear, hasTop, isFootWear, isVest, } from "../../../utilities"; import Clothing from "../Clothing"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; const MeasurementsForm = ({ clothingOptions, setClothingOptions, setWaist, setNaturalWaist, setGarmentLength, setHalfAcross, setChest, setTrouserWaistPosition, setSeat, setNeck, setShoulder, setSleeveLength, setSideSeamLength, setBodyRise, setInsideLeg, setWrist, setTopArm, setScyeDepth, setArmSleeveHole, setFrontalCollar, setHip, setFrontRise, setBackRise, setThigh, setKnee, setHem, setOutseam, setHeadSize, setFootSize, setDescription, loading, }) => { const {t} = useTranslation(); return ( <>

Click to select/deselect an item

{clothingList && clothingList.map((item, index) => ( ))}
{clothingOptions.length > 0 && ( <>

{clothingOptions.length}

Enter measurements below

)} {clothingOptions.length > 0 && ( <> {/* Tops and Pants */} {(hasTop(clothingOptions) || hasBottom(clothingOptions) || isVest(clothingOptions)) && (
setWaist(e.target.value)} />
)} {/* Shirts (long sleeve and short) */} {(hasTop(clothingOptions) || isVest(clothingOptions)) && ( <>
setNaturalWaist(e.target.value)} />
setGarmentLength(e.target.value)} /> setHalfAcross(e.target.value)} />
setChest(e.target.value)} /> setTrouserWaistPosition(e.target.value)} />
setSeat(e.target.value)} /> setNeck(e.target.value)} />
setShoulder(e.target.value)} /> setSleeveLength(e.target.value)} />
setSideSeamLength(e.target.value)} /> setBodyRise(e.target.value)} />
setInsideLeg(e.target.value)} /> setWrist(e.target.value)} />
setTopArm(e.target.value)} /> setScyeDepth(e.target.value)} />
{/* Vests only */}
setArmSleeveHole(e.target.value)} /> setFrontalCollar(e.target.value)} />
)} {/* Pants/Trousers: */} {hasBottom(clothingOptions) && ( <>
setHip(e.target.value)} />
setFrontRise(e.target.value)} /> setBackRise(e.target.value)} />
setThigh(e.target.value)} /> setKnee(e.target.value)} />
setHem(e.target.value)} /> setOutseam(e.target.value)} />
)} {/* Hats */} {hasHeadWear(clothingOptions) && (
setHeadSize(e.target.value)} />
)} {/* Footwear */} {isFootWear(clothingOptions) && (
setFootSize(e.target.value)} />
)} )}
); }; export default MeasurementsForm;
